text:
Ever since Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie announced they were getting a divorce, speculation on their status throughout the process has abounded. There have been rumors touching on everything from the actor’s dating life to the future of his wine estate with Jolie, Miraval. While the only people who know what’s happening for sure with their marriage and divorce are Jolie and Pitt, there are some rumors floating around that have already been debunked. Take a look below.

Brad Pitt is celibate.

It was recently reported by The Sun that Pitt is abstaining from sex for one year to work on himself, but E! News claims that’s not true.

Brad Pitt Is Studying the Kabbalah With Help From Demi Moore.

This is another lie, according to E! News, as is the suggestion that the pair are currently on bad terms.

Brad Pitt Sees His Kids Less Than Angelina Jolie.

This one is true, allegedly, as the pair’s six children are currently living with Jolie, so naturally she spends more time with them. What isn’t true, though, is that it’s because things are contentious, as Gossip Cop points out. Pitt apparently sees his kids more now than he did before he and Jolie separated. Plus, Jolie bought a house close to the one they previously shared so the kids wouldn’t be far from their dad, as The Daily Mail reported last May.

Jennifer Aniston Has Met Pitt and Jolie’s Kids.

The same In Touch report about Pitt seeing his kids less drops a subtle bombshell that Jolie became more uncooperative after Jennifer Aniston “met the kids by happenstance.” According to Gossip Cop, though, that is false. Plus, a source close to them told E! News, “They do text from time to time and have exchanged a few words over the years, but there’s nothing beyond that at this point. [Aniston] wishes Brad well, but that was a lifetime ago and they were both very different people back then.” There’s no basis to the rumor that their kids want to live with Aniston either, as Gossip Cop reported.

George Clooney Is Trying to Reunite Brad and Jen.

Pitt and Aniston show no signs of getting back together any time soon, even though New Idea reported that Clooney is facilitating a reunion. The article presented a ficticious dinner with Pitt, Sean Penn, Bradley Cooper, Laura Dern, and Clooney as proof. However, Clooney wasn’t even at the restaurant when the rest of them had dinner, according to Gossip Cop. Sorry, Jen and Brad shippers.

Related: Angelina Jolie Says She Tried to Save Marriage to Brad Pitt with By The Sea

A Photographic Guide To Everyone Brad Pitt Has Dated A pre-divorce Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt arrive at the premiere of By The Sea in Hollywood, in November 2015. The couple were together from 2005-2016. Photo by Getty Images. Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie attend the Global Summit to End Sexual Violence and Conflict in London in June 2014.The couple were together from 2005-2016. Photo by Getty Images. Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt, who met on the set of Mr. and Mrs. Smith, arrive for the premiere of The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008). The couple were together from 2005-2016. Photo by Getty Images. Where it all began: Brad Pitt and then-girlfriend Robin Givens in Los Angeles. The couple were together from 1986-1987. Photo by Getty Images. Actress Shalene McCall and Brad Pitt enjoyed a brief dalliance after meeting on the set of TV show Windmills of the Gods. The couple dated in 1987. Photo by Getty Images. McCall and Pitt are again spotted in Beverly Hills. The couple dated in 1987. Photo by Getty Images. Brad Pitt and Jill Schoelen, who dated for one year, are spotted by paparazzi. The couple were together from 1988-1989. Photo by Getty Images. On-set co-stars, Brad Pitt and Jill Schoelen enjoyed a brief relationship that drew great media attention. The couple dated in 1987. Photo by Getty Images. Brad Pitt and Jill Schoelen at the 20/20 Club in Los Angeles. The couple dated in 1987. Photo by Getty Images. Brad Pitt & Christina Applegate during 1989 MTV Video Music Awards in Los Angeles, California. The couple were together from 1988-1989. Photo by Getty Images. Christina Applegate and Brad Pitt spotted again in 1989. The couple were together from 1988-1989. Photo by Getty Images. Brad Pitt and actress Juliette Lewis enjoyed a lengthy long relationship in the public eye. Here they are in 1991. The couple were together from 1989-1993. Photo by Getty Images. Brad Pitt and Juliette Lewis at the AMC Theater in Santa Monica, for the premiere of Thelma & Louise (1991). The couple were together from 1989-1993. Photo by Getty Images. Brad and Gwyneth Paltrow attend the Hamlet Broadway Play Opening Night Performance in 1995, in New York City. The couple were together from 1994-1997. Photo by Getty Images. Gwyneth Paltrow and Brad Pitt, 1996. The couple were together from 1994-1997. Photo by Getty Images. Brad Pitt and girlfriend actress Gwyneth Paltrow arrive before the 68th Annual Academy Awards on March 25, 1996 in Los Angeles, California. The couple were together from 1994-1997. Photo by Getty Images. Brad Pitt and actress Gwyneth Paltrow attend The Devil’s Own New York City premiere on March 13, 1997, in New York City. The couple were together from 1994-1997. Photo by Getty Images. Actress Claire Forlani and actor Brad Pitt attend the 50th Annual Writers Guild of America Awards in 1998, in Beverly Hills, California. The couple dated in 1998. Photo by Getty Images. Brad and Jennifer attend the Rock Star premiere in 2001 in Hollywood. The couple were together from 1998-2005. Photo by Getty Images. Actress Jennifer Aniston and actor Brad Pitt attend The Mexican Westwood premiere in 2001. The couple were together from 1998-2005. Photo by Getty Images. Brad Pitt and Jennifer Aniston, married for five years, appear here at the 51st Annual Primetime Emmy Awards, in 1999. The couple were together from 1998-2005. Ron Galella, Ltd. The couple, thought to be an American institution, divorced in 2005. Here the couple make an appearance at the 59th Annual Golden Globe Awards. The couple were together from 1998-2005. Photo by Getty Images. INFO 1/22
title: Brad Pitt Rumors Are Flying, But a Lot of Them Have Been Debunked

og.title: A Handy Guide to Brad Pitt Rumors That Have Been Debunked
